title: Fruity spinach and feta salad
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '300g cashews', '275g frozen raspberries, thawed', '125ml red wine vinegar', '125ml extra virgin olive oil', '3 hearts romaine, chopped', '285g fresh baby spinach', '3 pears, cored and diced', '75g dried cherries', '160g feta cheese, crumbled']
